com.inrix.sdk

Class IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInBox, IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius
    Enclosing class:
    IncidentsManager

    public abstract static class IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase<T>
extends Object
    A set of common options for requesting XD incidents.

      • setIncidentOutputFields

        public final void setIncidentOutputFields(IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase.IncidentOutputField... outputFields)
        Sets the list of IncidentOutputFields. If not set, default contains all IncidentOutputField enums with the exception of IncidentOutputField.AREA and IncidentOutputField.RDS.
        Parameters:
        outputFields - the list of IncidentOutputFields.
